remarks.para: The WinForm Controls library contains extended controls for use in WinForm programs.
The WinForm Controls library is part of the LJCLibraries solution.
The LJCDataGrid and LJCGridRow classes provided enhanced functionality for List Grids.
The LJCTabControl, LJCTabPanel and LJCPanelManager classes provide enhanced functionality for Tab controls.
LJCItemCombo and LJCItem provide enhanced functionality for Combobox controls.
